summary.para: Defines the raw input data coming from the specified keyboard.

remarks.para: For information about keyboard types, subtypes, scan code modes, and related keyboard layouts, see the documentation in kbd.h, ntdd8042.h and ntddkbd.h headers in Windows SDK, and the Keyboard Layout Samples.

summary.para: The type of keyboard. See Remarks.

| Value | Description | |:-----:|------------------------------------------------------| | 0x4 | Enhanced 101- or 102-key keyboards (and compatibles) | | 0x7 | Japanese Keyboard | | 0x8 | Korean Keyboard | | 0x51 | Unknown type or HID keyboard |
The vendor-specific subtype of the keyboard. See Remarks.
The scan code mode. Usually 1, which means that Scan Code Set 1 is used. See Keyboard Scan Code Specification.
The number of function keys on the keyboard.
The number of LED indicators on the keyboard.
The total number of keys on the keyboard.
